item.title: Building Live555 RTSP library in Visual Studio 2015
item.description: Update 2017-08-23 Thanks to @kwikwag for making a Windows batch file to simplify all this! Find it here. Live555 is an excellent RTSP library for Windows, but can be a bit tricky to build. These are the instructions that I follow to build it in Visual Studio 2015 in Windows 10 Professional. 1) Extract the live555-latest.tar.gz into your source directory. 2) Make the following changes to the win32config file: Change msvcirt.
